reviewText: This artist was TOO technical for me to understand. I will try this DVD again when I get to a higher level. of my learning.  I think with more practice I will be able to pick up some pointers from this artist.

This is an excellent beginner guide.  I'm an absolute beginner at artistic painting of any kind and I feel this video gave me a great start.  He covers a tremendous amount of information and explains, in a manner very understandable to a novice, what to do and why it's done that way.
